questions: Can you tell me about yourself?

What are your strengths and weaknesses?
How do you handle conflict at work?
Where do you see yourself in 5 years?

How do you handle stress and pressure?
What motivates you to do your best work?
How do you handle criticism?
Describe a time you faced a difficult situation at work.
How do you balance work and personal life?
What is your preferred working style?
Describe a time you had to adapt to change.
How do you handle disagreements with colleagues?
Why should we hire you?
What do you know about our company culture?
Describe your ideal work environment.
How do you prioritize tasks?
Have you ever had a conflict with a manager? How did you resolve it?
Tell me about a time you took initiative.
How do you approach learning new skills?
Describe a situation where you went above and beyond.
What kind of manager brings out the best in you?
Tell me about a mistake you made and what you learned.
How do you handle tight deadlines?
Describe your experience with performance evaluations.
What do you consider your biggest achievement?
How do you handle multiple tasks at once?
